scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run pages:dev
scripts.pages:deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.migrate:status: wrangler d1 execute hire-tracker --local --command "SELECT * FROM _migrations ORDER BY name"
scripts.migrate:status:prod: wrangler d1 execute hire-tracker --remote --command "SELECT * FROM _migrations ORDER BY name"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=fanfare-inventory-tracker
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=fanfare-inventory-tracker --branch=main
